title: Can't open League application
body: Hi, yesterday I could play LoL, but today everytime i try and open LoL it just doesn't do anything.

replies.body:
It's the same issue for many of us. This happen to me last patch as well and litlte did I know then, there was a patch 3 days prior to me wanting to play this game...

I have the same issue... application won't launch with RADS error.. and of course. don't bother trying to uninstall and re-download the game.. you'll find, you can't even donwload the game.. ( I tried it today, but  Idid not uninstallâ€”a lesson learned from last patch) 

In short.. you'll just have to wait it out until RIOT fixes their stuff.

People being unable to download the game is not affecting everyone. I'm not saying it's each individual's problem, but to Riot it seems like nothing is wrong because a lot of people are still playing the game fine.

What info I've gathered is that it seems to be affecting Mac users the most, and some Windows users who use Chrome web browser.
